org.apache.spark.ml.tuning
Class ParamGridBuilder

Object
  org.apache.spark.ml.tuning.ParamGridBuilder

public class ParamGridBuilder
extends Object

:: Experimental :: Builder for a param grid used in grid search-based model selection.
